description:
Javi wins the award for Most Jack-Off Techniques! He is fast and furious and uses all kinds of ways to please his cock. Making it a bit challenging to cut this video continuously. At any given moment he switches speed and angle of attack.
I liked Javi cuz he reminded me of one of the characters on Glee (Kurt Hummel) and I well, who I think he is kind of adorable. (Yes I am a Gleek!)
So Javi does a fine job showing off his many jack off techniques. He is just 18 and still has some teenage acne, so please be a bit forgiving. His body is tight and skin is all porcelain-like, not to forget that his abs are rockin'.
I think he was pretty "into" the solo and showing of for you. LOTS of energy in this one!
title: Javi - Solo
